metadata.title: FTL: MULTIVERSE - Japanese Patch
metadata.author: ranhai613 , forked from AyKo/ftl-multiverse-japanese-patch
metadata.description:
This is a Japanese translation mod for FTL Multiverse. This mod includes DeepL translation and complementary hand translation. Make sure all mod versions meet the requirements. Do NOT put "Hyperspace.ftl" in mod folder.
Mod Load Order | Multiverse - Assets (Patch above Data).zip | Multiverse - Data.zip | Hyperspace-ja.ftl | JapaneseFonts.ftl | Multiverse - Japanese Patch.zip V Any other MV Addons
